sentences.en: ...an historical film clip of Lenin speaking.
sentences.cn: …一段列宁讲话的历史电影片断。

sentences.en: a cartoon clipped from a Minneapolis newspaper
sentences.cn: 从明尼阿波利斯市的一份报纸上剪下来的一幅漫画

sentences.en: a stack of bills clipped together
sentences.cn: 夹在一起的一沓钞票

sentences.en: a wad of money in a gold clip
sentences.cn: 用金夹子夹着的一沓钞票

sentences.en: Clip document together, please.
sentences.cn: 请把文件夹在一起.

sentences.en: Did your earrings clip on?
sentences.cn: 你的耳环夹上去了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't forget to clip the token and stick it on your card.
sentences.cn: 别忘了剪下标志，贴到你的卡上。

sentences.en: Fasten these sheets of paper together with a clip, please.
sentences.cn: 请用回形针将这些纸别在一起.

sentences.en: Give the hedge a clip.
sentences.cn: 把树篱修剪一下.

sentences.en: He scrounged around in his desk drawer for a paper clip.
sentences.cn: 他在书桌抽届里翻来翻去找纸夹.

sentences.en: I heard the clip clip of the horses'hooves.
sentences.cn: 我听见了得得的马蹄声.

sentences.en: I spent several days with him, eight hours at a clip.
sentences.cn: 我和他共度了几天，每天八小时在一起。

sentences.en: May I clip out the report on my performance?
sentences.cn: 我能把报道我的文章剪下来 吗 ?

sentences.en: She fastened the papers together with a paper clip.
sentences.cn: 她用曲别针把文件别在一起.

sentences.en: She gave him a clip on the ear.
sentences.cn: 她打了他一记耳光.

sentences.en: She took the clip out of her hair.
sentences.cn: 她把发夹取了下来。

sentences.en: Studios are releasing movies at a fast clip.
sentences.cn: 电影制片公司发行新片的速度很快。

sentences.en: The BBC World Service Television news showed the same film clip.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司对外电视频道的新闻节目播放了同样的电影剪辑片段。

sentences.en: The hedges had just been clipped.
sentences.cn: 树篱刚修剪过。

sentences.en: The wire is held on with a metal clip.
sentences.cn: 电线用金属夹子固定。

sentences.en: They moved out from the airport at a brisk clip.
sentences.cn: 他们迅速撤离机场。

sentences.en: We'd better pin [ clip ] the papers together.
sentences.cn: 我们最好把这些文件别在一起.

words.tran_cn: 省略一部分的；发音清楚的
头等的，第一流的；极好的，恰好的
快速帆船；大剪刀；剪削者；理发剪
剪裁，剪断；剪报，剪辑；剪下物，剪下的东西

phrases.tran_cn: 剪贴画；剪贴图集；剪辑艺术
黑店；夜总会；敲竹杠的场所
修剪（鸟）的羽毛以防止其飞行
电视节目中作补充用的短影片
钢丝夹，钢缆夹；边线；线夹

trans.tran_cn: 夹子，回形针，（电影）片段，修剪，耳光，弹夹
trans.tran_en: A clip from a film or a radio or television programme is a short piece of it that is broadcast separately
to cut small amounts of something in order to make it tidier
to fasten something together or to be fastened together using a clip

trans.tran_cn: 夹住， 扣住； 剪， 修剪
trans.tran_en: to fasten something together or to be fastened together using a clip
